update seat_stock_t
zone_id = #{zoneId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

logic_row = #{logicRow,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
row_num = #{rowNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

block_quality = #{blockQuality,jdbcType=BIGINT},
row_quality = #{rowQuality,jdbcType=BIGINT},
row_order = #{rowOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT},
row_quality_typ = #{rowQualityTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
row_order_typ = #{rowOrderTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

seat_position_y = #{seatPositionY,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

sale_situat_typ = #{saleSituatTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sellstop_typ = #{sellstopTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

cs_fr_en_grp_cd = #{csFrEnGrpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

backup_dt = #{backupDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

lst_proc_dt = #{lstProcDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

create_dt = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_dt = #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where seat_stock_id = #{seatStockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and update_dt = #{checkUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and update_user_id = #{checkUpdateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and LOGIC_DELETE_FLG = '0'
